cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What do you hope your last words will be?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What non-spiritual belief do you hold but have no proof of?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What kinds of confrontation are you uncomfortable with?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: When do you feel like you need alone time?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What is the quickest way to change a bad mood?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What do you find the most charming about me?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: How satisfied are you with your work?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What do you think about most often?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What kind of gifts do you like?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: What kind of gifts do you not like?

cards.name: Tell Me....
cards.desc: How do you deal with difficult people?

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: You are the better cook

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you have had sex while your parents are home

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ...you were the first of you to catch the feels

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ...you are the bigger flirt

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you spend the most time on your phone

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you paid for the last dinner out.

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you spend the most time working out.

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you have the most Instagram followers

cards.name: Drink if...
cards.desc: ... you have the most Facebook followers

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... go like the first post on your partner's social?

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... guess your partner's favorite restaurant?

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... make a dinner reservation for you and your partner within the next week?

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... guess your partner's favorite show?

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... say your partner's biggest flaw?

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: .. tell your partner two truths and one lie.
cards.flavortext: If they guess the lie, you drink. If not, they do!

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... tell your partner about your most embarrassing moment.

cards.name: Can you...
cards.desc: ... guess your partner's favorite restaurant.

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Kiss your partner neck, starting in the back, and making a full circle
cards.flavortext: Ask if they want licks or nibbles!

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Kiss your partner.

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Tell your partner where you want to be kissed

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Stand behind your partner. Wrap your arms around them and kiss them.

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Face your partner and hug them.
cards.flavortext: Get as much contact as possible!

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Pretend you need to examine your partners tonsils.
cards.flavortext: Then perform a more thorough exam  with your tongue

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Suck on your partners fingers or toes (your choice)

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Suck on your partners fingers or toes (their choice)

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Gently lick your partner's ear lobes
cards.flavortext: Take small breaks to blow on them

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Massage your partner's shoulders
cards.flavortext: If they are satisfied, you may kiss them when done

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Massage your partner's hands
cards.flavortext: If they are satisfied, you may kiss them when done

cards.name: You May
cards.desc: Massage your partner's feet
cards.flavortext: If they are satisfied, you may kiss them when done
